Package seng201.team53.game.items.upgrade

Class UpgradeItem

java.lang.Object
seng201.team53.game.items.upgrade.UpgradeItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Item, Purchasable
Direct Known Subclasses:
UpgradeItemFasterReload, UpgradeItemFillCart, UpgradeItemRepairTower, UpgradeItemSlowerCart
public abstract class UpgradeItem extends Object implements Purchasable, Item
Represents an upgrade item that can be purchased and applied to a tower or cart

      name - The name of the upgrade
      description - The description of the upgrade
      costPrice - The cost price of the upgrade
      cartUpgrade - Whether the upgrade can be used on a cart
      towerUpgrade - Whether the upgrade can be used on a tower

    • getApplicableItems

      protected List<Upgradeable> getApplicableItems(Collection<? extends Upgradeable> collection)
      Returns a list of upgradable items from a collection that can apply this upgrade. The supplied collection can be a list of carts or towers depending on the implementation of the specific upgrade
      Parameters:
      collection - The collection of upgradable items
      Returns:
      A list of upgradable items that can apply this upgrade

      public abstract boolean canApply(Upgradeable upgradeable)
      Determines if this upgrade can be applied to a given upgradable item
      Parameters:

      Returns:
